faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to commonly asked questions.
faq.shippingAnswer: Domestic shipping typically takes 2-3 business days. International shipping may take approximately 10 days.
faq.refundQuestion: Can I return or get a refund?
faq.refundAnswer: Returns and refunds are accepted within 7 days of receiving the product. Please see our return policy for details.
faq.orderStatusQuestion: Where can I check my order status?
faq.orderStatusAnswer: You can check your order status on the Order Status page or through your account's order history.
faq.contactQuestion: How else can I contact you?
faq.contactAnswer: Feel free to reach out through our contact form.
faq.paymentAnswer: We accept credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, AMEX, JCB) and bank transfers. Invoice-based billing is also available for business customers.
faq.warrantyQuestion: Do products come with a warranty?
faq.warrantyAnswer: All our LED products include a standard 1-year manufacturer warranty. Manufacturing defects during the warranty period will be repaired or replaced at no charge.
faq.b2bQuestion: How can businesses or research institutions purchase?
faq.b2bAnswer: We offer quotation services, invoice-based billing, and flexible purchasing options for businesses and research institutions. Feel free to contact us.
faq.internationalAnswer: Yes, we offer international shipping. Delivery typically takes about 10 days. Shipping costs vary by region and are calculated at checkout.
faq.installationQuestion: Is the product difficult to install?
faq.installationAnswer: Our LED lighting products are designed for easy installation. Each product comes with an installation manual. Feel free to contact us if you have any questions.
faq.specQuestion: Where can I find detailed product specifications?
faq.specAnswer: Detailed specifications (power consumption, luminosity, wavelength, dimensions, etc.) are listed on each product page. Contact us for additional technical documentation.
faq.couponQuestion: How do I use a coupon?
faq.couponAnswer: If you have a coupon code, enter it in the coupon field on the cart page or during checkout and click 'Apply'. The discount will be applied automatically.

legalNotice.title: Legal Notice
legalNotice.addressPhoneValue: Disclosed upon request without delay. Please contact us through the contact form.
legalNotice.priceValue: Shown on each product page (tax included)
legalNotice.paymentMethodValue: Credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, AMEX, JCB), bank transfer
legalNotice.deliveryTimeValue: Orders are usually shipped within 2-3 business days.
legalNotice.returnPolicyValue: Please contact us within 7 days of receiving the product. See our {link} for details.

home.heroTagline: Maximize growing performance with the latest technology.
home.heroSubtagline: Professional-grade plant grow lights trusted by universities and research institutions.
home.researchLabel: A Powerful Partner for Research & Development
home.researchDescription: Led Kikaku provides full support for your research and business needs. With a trusted track record supplying to government agencies, leading pharmaceutical companies, and national universities, our knowledgeable staff will recommend the best products tailored to your requirements. From initial consultation to ongoing support, we are your partner every step of the way. We flexibly accommodate various needs, from grow facility setup to invoice-based billing. Feel free to reach out.

cms.preparing: This page is currently being prepared.

fallback.legal: The legal notice content is currently being prepared. Please check the Legal Notice page for details, or contact us if you need immediate assistance.
fallback.privacy: We manage your personal information appropriately in accordance with applicable laws. A detailed privacy policy is being prepared. Please contact us if you have any questions.
fallback.terms: Terms of use for this service are being prepared, including conditions of use, prohibited actions, and disclaimers. Please contact us if you have any questions.
fallback.refund: Returns and refunds are accepted within 7 days of receiving the product, provided items are unopened and unused. Return shipping costs are borne by the customer. For manufacturing defects, we will cover the shipping costs. Please contact us for details.
fallback.about: Led Kikaku is a specialty store providing professional-grade plant grow lights and LED lighting products. With an extensive track record of supplying to universities, research institutions, and businesses, we provide optimal solutions for your research and business needs.
fallback.shipping: Domestic shipping typically takes 2-3 business days. Shipping costs vary by product and destination. Some items qualify for free shipping. International shipping is also available, with delivery in approximately 10 days.
